modName: Dogs of Skyrim - Remove Good Dog Dialogue
summary: Removes the \"Good Dog\" dialogue from the Dogs of Skyrim mod.
descriptionHtml:
= Intro =
In the great mod Dogs of Skyrim (by Ichibu), followers kept saying \"Good Dog\" to my dog companion. 
It was the only thing I disliked with the mod so I took the liberty of removing the Good Dog topic from the game. 

= Installation =
* Activate the mod with NMM. Make sure it loads after Dogs of Skyrim. 

= Requirements =
* Dogs of Skyrim by Ichibu. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35008//?
author: ZombieBobie

files.name: Dogs of Skyrim - Removed Good Dog dialogue
